name

java.lang.String name
Generic name for the compoent. For packages, package name, for journals the journal title. Try to follow DC-Title style naming conventions when trying to decide what to map to this property in a subclass. The name should be a string that reasonably identifies this object when placed in a list of other components.

normname

java.lang.String normname
The normalised name of this component. Lowecase, strip diacritics

outgoingCombos

java.util.Set outgoingCombos

shortcode

java.lang.String shortcode
A URI style shortcode for the component referenced. Used to create unique but human readable URIs for this item.

status

RefdataValue status
Component Status. Linked to refdata table.

tags

java.util.Set tags

getCombosByPropertyName

@Transient
java.lang.Object getCombosByPropertyName(java.lang.Object propertyName)
Return the combos pertaining to a specific property (Rather than the components linked). Needed for editing start/end dates. Initially on publisher, but probably on other things too later on.

refdataFind

static java.lang.Object refdataFind(java.lang.Object params)
refdataFind generic pattern needed by inplace edit taglib to provide reference data to typedowns and other UI components. objects implementing this method can be easily located and listed / selected
